title: Vice President Biden to travel to Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania on labor day | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




September 03, 2009

 



Vice President Biden to travel to Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania on labor day




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                   September 3, 2009 **MEDIA ADVISORY** Vice President Biden to Travel to Pittsburgh on Labor Day  Washington, D.C. – On Monday, September 7, Vice President Biden will travel to Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, to kick-off the city’s annual Labor Day parade. This event is OPEN PRESS. Additional media details are below. Media Details: Vice President Biden to travel to Pittsburgh, PA Event Speaker: Vice President Joe Biden Date: September 7, 2009 Location: Mellon Arena  Outside Gate 1  66 Mario Lemieux Place  Pittsburgh, PA 15219 Press Entrance: Centre Avenue Sat Truck Parking: East parking lot off  Centre Avenue Camera Preset: 5:00 – 6:00 AM EDT Restricted Access: 6:00 – 7:30 AM EDT Press Arrival: 7:30 AM EDT Final Press Access: 8:30 AM EDT Event Begins: 9:15 AM EDT Throw: 30 feet, Cable Run: 500 feet, **bring cable covers** RSVP: This event is OPEN PRESS. Media must RSVP with the NAME, POSITION (Reporter, TV Camera, Photog, etc.) MEDIA OUTLET, PHONE and EMAIL for each person planning to cover the event to press@ovp.eop.gov by Sunday, September 6, at 3:00 PM EDT. At the event, you will be required to wear your outlet’s media credential at all times, either around the neck or pinned to clothing. Ground Contact: For press logistics questions, please call Samantha Finke at 202-590-8248
